plot style


Since 1.2, there is the "plot style" button in the main menu that permits to change the overall style of a plot.

The known styles are the ones found in the ioda.style (see

Customization, the ioda.style file

).

For example choose examples/hrand :

Then choose "plot style" from the main menu :

Choose "all" to apply the new style to all plots, and then choose "ROOT_default" in :

You should see :

(which is not necessarily our preferred plot style !).

You can customize per plot by choosing a plot index instead of "all" and have for example the hippodraw style for the first plot and the ROOT style for the second plot :
